application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Lime Pollard to 3m to leave tree 6m and 4m wide.T.2 Pollard by 5m to leave tree 6m and 4m wide to match T.1.
decision_conditions: T.1 Lime - Crown reduction to suitable growth points at 10m from ground level, Crown lift to 4m from ground level removing all epicormic growth, ivy & deadwood.T.2 Lime - Crown reduction to suitable growth points at 10m from ground level, Crown lift to 4m from ground level removing all epicormic growth, ivy & deadwood.
